snippet.title: New Hollywood Starring Mindy Kaling
snippet.description: Yes, she plays the title character on the Fox comedy favorite ''The Mindy Project,'' but it's everything she does behind the scenes -- from writing and producing to tweeting and blogging -- that's made her emerge this past year as one of the freshest, smartest, most interesting voices in pop culture; the lady's got a lot to say -- and you're going to want to listen up
